original_text: Then Jehu went into the house of Baal with Jehonadab the son of Rechab, and he said to the worshipers of Baal, “Search, and see that there is no servant of the Lord here among you, but only the worshipers of Baal.”
korean_text: 예후가 레갑의 아들 여호나답과 더불어 바알의 신당에 들어가서 바알을 섬기는 자들에게 이르되 너희는 살펴보아 바알을 섬기는 자들만 여기 있게 하고 여호와의 종은 하나도 여기 너희 중에 있지 못하게 하라 하고

sentences.original_text: Then Jehu went into the house of Baal
with Jehonadab the son of Rechab,
and he said to the worshipers of Baal,
and see that there is no servant of the Lord here among you,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 가운데 여호와의 종이 여기 없는지 확인하고,

sentences.original_text: but only the worshipers of Baal.”
